pages.text: Austroraptor was a medium-sized dromaeosaurid theropod dinosaur that lived during the Late Cretaceous Period (70-66 million years ago) in what is now Argentina. It was characterized by its relatively large size for a dromaeosaurid, reaching approximately 6 meters (20 feet) in length.
Like a Velociraptor from Jurassic Park, but with feathers and a fish addiction lol
